I went to the mailbox after that, and found our book box, along with other mail. I was very relieved to see it on Monday, since Tuesday the 20th was our last day of school, and I had two families waiting for books. UPS service is usually timely and reliable. When the post office is involved, the quality of service declines. I am disappointed about that, because I want the USPS to be timely and reliable, but they’re not. I recognize that there may be increased cost associated with using UPS to deliver all the way to the customer, and I understand the need to reduce costs. I just want you to be aware that reducing the financial cost of delivery also carries a reduction in the quality of service to your customers.
